items.title: Backpropagate through a tensorflow linspace
items.body:
I have a tensorflow variable defined as

    tf_y_min = tf.reduce_min(tf_f)
    tf_y_max = tf.reduce_max(tf_f)
    tf_ydelta = (tf_y_max-tf_y_min)/(Ny-1)
    tf_y_linspace = tf.linspace(tf_y_min,tf_y_max,Ny)

where tf_f is the output of a neural network. However, I am not able to calculate the gradient with respect to the weights of the neural network,

tf.gradients(tf_y_linspace,tf_weights)

I get the error, Fetch argument None has invalid type <class 'NoneType'>

How can I solve this?
